{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Orange Dream Orb |image = [[File:Orange Dream Orb.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Orange Dream Orb''. |location =
*[[Towns & Cities#Unova|Black and White Park]] }} ==Description== The '''Orange Dream Orb''' can be opened at the [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Black and White Park]] as soon as you get Thundurus (Therian) from opening the [[Green Dream Orbs]]. ==Opening Animation== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! !! Animation |- ! Animation | [[File:Orange Dream Orb Opening.gif|60px]] |} ==Acquisition== Orange [[Dream Orbs]] can be gotten as soon as you get Thundurus (Therian) from the [[Green Dream Orbs]]. ==Drop Pool== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" |- ! Reward !! Drop Chance |- | [[File:Protein.png|30px]] [[Protein]] || 27.5% |- | [[File:Fire Stone.png|30px]] [[Fire Stone]] || 25% |- | [[File:Rotom Shuffle.png|40px]] Rotom || 13.4% |- | [[File:Staryu Shuffle.png|40px]] Staryu || 13.3% |- | [[File:Ralts Shuffle.png|40px]] Ralts || 13.3% |- | [[File:Landorus (Therian) Shuffle.png|40px]] Landorus (Therian) || 7.5% |- |}
